price: 42. De dag wanneer zij een schreeuw in waarheid zullen horen, dat zal de dag worden van de opstanding.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yawma yasmaʿūna al-ṣayḥata bil-ḥaqi dhālika yawmu al-khurūji
